attributes.action: Make it compulsory to take and pass the CBT bike training test before learning to drive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As well as the theory test that you have to take before you can take your driving test, it would be beneficial to make it compulsory (all able bodied) to take the CBT bike test before learning to drive as it gives you a better awareness of the road and all road users. This would reduce young driver accidents

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
